cab.content: , /si!x^/ . . .From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 24th Decemher 1917./ :'. :-'' . (Received at India Office on 25th, at 10 a,m.) /Secret, Weekly Report. Waziristan raid (vide our telegram of the 18th December) now reported work of Sulaiman Khel and of W^azir a.nd Sheranni outlaws from Shakin in Afghan territory. Fellow tribesmen in British territory are being arrested as reprisal.North-West Frontier quiet. Chin disturbances separately reported.No change in general military situation in India or Afghanistan.
